response.share_text: #中国空间站4只鼠鼠征名#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户问的是关于中国空间站4只小鼠征名的事情。看了搜索结果，发现这是神舟二十一号带上太空的4只实验鼠，两雌两雄，现在新华社正在征集名字呢。

用户可能就是想了解这件事的来龙去脉，想知道这些小鼠的基本情况，还有大家都在给它们起什么名字。从搜索结果看，这事还挺火的，很多网友都在参与。

这些小鼠可不一般啊，是从300只里面精挑细选出来的。它们经历了转棒测试、抗眩晕测试、迷宫测试等各种考验，真是“鼠中龙凤”。现在在空间站过得还不错，住的是恒温26℃的“豪宅”，有自动喂食和清洁系统。

至于名字嘛，网友们脑洞大开。有走可爱路线的“舒克”“贝塔”，有玩成语梗的“从从”“容容”“游刃”“有余”，还有科技风的“鼠标”。还有人建议叫“星宝”“辰豆”这种诗意的名字，或者“九天”“揽月”这种有航天特色的。

其实给它们起名不只是好玩，背后有科研意义。这些小黑鼠是C57BL/6品系，和人类基因相似度高达85%。它们在太空中活动情况、生理变化，都是在为人类未来长期太空生活探路。

征名活动是新华社发起的，现在还在进行中。用户要是感兴趣也可以去参与，给这些“太空先锋”起个响亮的名字！


关于中国空间站4只实验鼠的征名活动及相关背景，综合整理如下：
### **一、实验鼠基础信息**
1. **身份特征**
- **编号与性别**：4只小鼠编号为154（雌性）、186（雌性）、98（雄性）、6（雄性）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [12], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "内蒙古青年", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228853488260217", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}], "name": "内蒙古青年", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1023.1023.50/91922131ly8h8vgjy66xlj20sf0sfaba.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=OupRa26FOa", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228853488260217", "vType": 1}}```
- **品系与选育**：均为C57BL/6品系近交系小黑鼠，遗传背景均一，与人类基因相似度达85%。黑色毛发可增强宇宙辐射防护能力，提高实验数据可靠性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [29], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "风云梦远", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227586625998058", "index": 29, "label": "大v"}], "name": "风云梦远", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.369.369.50/c47da9b5ly8i5eub3m4sgj20a90a9aa8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=gV852D3cJQ", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227586625998058", "vType": 0}}```
- **选拔过程**：从300只候选鼠中历经5轮筛选（淘汰率超90%），通过体能（转棒测试需坚持110秒）、抗眩晕、平衡力及迷宫智商测试等严苛训练。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [2, 27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228278191231736", "index": 2, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "咸宁发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227779403810922", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "CCTV焦点访谈", "img": "https://tva1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/71eef0e3jw1e8qgp5bmzyj2050050aa8.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=SzPrs8WKlI", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228278191231736", "vType": 3}}```

2. **太空任务目标**
- 研究微重力与密闭环境对小鼠**行为模式、器官功能（如骨钙流失、肌肉萎缩）及生理机制**的影响。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 9, "data": {"num": [3], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "那抹微风198110", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227573572801093", "index": 3, "label": ""}]}}```
- 为人类长期太空生存（如登月、火星任务）提供医学数据支撑。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 10, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "应旺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227616042746960", "index": 33, "label": "大v"}], "name": "应旺", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/73ae3ca8ly8i566cckfwpj20u00u0wgj.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=djnX3tuWs3", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227616042746960", "vType": 0}}```
CCTV焦点访谈
应旺

### **二、征名活动背景**
- **发起方**：新华社、新华网等官方媒体于2025年11月3日发起征名活动，呼吁网友为4只已入驻空间站的小鼠命名。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [1, 6, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "红星新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228941830783607", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228824792924931", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228817792894927", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "红星新闻", "img": "https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/006FcX4dly8h8vgewp7wsj30e80e8mxd.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=ltCI0lAV%2BR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228941830783607", "vType": 3}}```
- **命名要求**：需为四只鼠分别取名，体现创意与中国航天特色。
- **当前状态**：小鼠在空间站生活良好，居住于26℃恒温智能生态舱，配备自动供食、清洁系统及模拟自然洞穴的躲避笼。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [1], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "红星新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228941830783607", "index": 1, "label": ""}]}}```
红星新闻

### **三、网友创意命名方案汇总**
以下是目前热度较高的命名建议（分类整理）：

| **命名风格** | **具体名字组合** | **灵感来源/寓意** | **引用来源** |
|--------------------|--------------------------------|---------------------------------------|-----------------|
| **趣味玩梗型** | 鼠标、键盘、主机、显示器 | 电脑配件梗，调侃“鼠鼠标兵” | |
| | 舒克、贝塔、钢弹、铁蛋 | 经典动画角色致敬 | |
| **诗意文化型** | 从从、容容、游刃、有余 | 成语“从容不迫”“游刃有余”，寄寓适应太空 | |
| | 星宝、辰豆、月芽、云朵 | 宇宙元素与自然意象结合 | |
| | 九天、揽月、星辰、大海 | 航天梦想与古典诗意融合 | |
| **宏大主题型** | 凌霄、启明、逐辰、擎穹 | 象征直上云霄、探索宇宙的雄心 | |
| | 光光、宗宗、耀耀、祖祖 | 谐音“光宗耀祖”，致敬科研突破 | |
| **地域幽默型** | 左折耳根、右折耳根（另两未定） | 网友调侃地域特色 | |
| | 泰泰、锋锋、空空、献献 | 谐音“太空先锋” | |

```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 18, "data": {"num": [1, 10, 15, 17, 18, 20, 21, 23, 25, 30, 31, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "生活帮", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228860729987028", "index": 10, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "红星新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228941830783607", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "次嗯陈____", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228970815527935", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "匿名潜水选手", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228967142886376", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "菏泽市图书馆", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228969323659447", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "梁言2160", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228939867327177", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "你打草我惊蛇", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228933368779670", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "江氏小盗龙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855578067439", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "-四分三十三秒-", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228834591083270", "index": 25, "label": ""}, {"name": "江西丰城发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228980934279521", "index": 30, "label": ""}, {"name": "李诗情Aileen", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228971064033645", "index": 31, "label": ""}, {"name": "蓦鳶", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228978208247858", "index": 32, "label": ""}], "name": "生活帮", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.824.824.50/6dc7d591ly8hs0fpd4aunj20mw0mwgm2.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=yY2OVzjM%2Fj", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228860729987028", "vType": 3}}```
### **四、命名建议方向参考**
若需自主构思，可参考以下角度：
1. **科研精神**：选用象征探索、突破的词汇，如“求索”“无疆”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "梁言2160", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228939867327177", "index": 20, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **航天成就**：结合中国航天器名称，如“天和”“问天”“梦舟”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [20, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "江氏小盗龙", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855578067439", "index": 23, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "梁言2160", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228939867327177", "index": 20, "label": ""}], "name": "江氏小盗龙", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.180.0.1080.1080.50/4794ca59ly1gdi70rlq7ej21400u0tiu.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=y%2B5PxEbTX%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228855578067439", "vType": 0}}```
3. **美好祝愿**：强调平安凯旋，如“平安”“如意”“凯旋”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "梁言2160", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228939867327177", "index": 20, "label": ""}]}}```
### **五、实验意义与价值**
- **填补研究空白**：我国首次在轨开展哺乳动物实验，完善“微生物-脊椎动物”空间科研链条。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [33], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "应旺", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5227616042746960", "index": 33, "label": ""}]}}```
- **深空探测奠基**：数据将直接服务于2030年前载人登月计划，破解长期太空生存的健康风险。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新闻360", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228956779546304", "index": 19, "label": "大v"}], "name": "新闻360", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/692e615dly8hwjqlwcqu8j20j60j6gmi.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=pfYQpVfiDk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228956779546304", "vType": 3}}```
- **成果转化潜力**：研究成果或推动抗骨质疏松药物、太空健身器材等技术落地民用领域。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新闻360", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228956779546304", "index": 19, "label": ""}]}}```

网友可通过新华社官方渠道参与征名，最终命名将赋予这些“无声探路者”以独特的航天使命符号。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [6, 8], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228824792924931", "index": 6, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228817792894927", "index": 8, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1762180522&ssig=bnsBk4kaeA", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5228824792924931", "vType": 3}}```
